trans-unit.source: Baysix's Web-Based Editor - Just web-based for now; sourcecode release is still forthcoming.
trans-unit.target: Baysix的基于Web的编辑器 -目前仅基于 Web；源代码发布仍在进行中。

trans-unit.source: FromDarkHell's Profile Editor - Written in C#, has EXE downloads for ease of use on Windows.
trans-unit.target: FromDarkHell的配置文件编辑器 -用C＃编写，具有EXE下载，可在Windows上轻松使用。

trans-unit.source: Raptor's CLI Tools - These are written in Go, and the project has easy downloads for Windows, Mac, and Linux (in addition to the sourcecode).
trans-unit.target: Raptor的CLI工具 -这些都是用Go编写的，该项目可以轻松下载Windows，Mac和Linux（以及源代码）。

trans-unit.source: sandsmark's borderlands3-save-editor - Written in C++ with Qt for GUI. Is still in development. Native downloads for Windows, but should compile fine on other platforms.
trans-unit.target: sandsmark的borderlands3-save-editor-用C ++编写，带有Qt for GUI。仍在开发中。Windows的本机下载，但在其他平台上应该可以正常编译。

trans-unit.source: --item-mayhem-max and --item-mayhem-levels will now apply Mayhem parts to grenades as well as weapons.
trans-unit.target: --item-mayhem-max 和 --item-mayhem-levels 现在将Mayhem零件应用于手榴弹和武器。

trans-unit.source: -v/--verbose now implies the four options above.
trans-unit.target: -v / --verbose 现在隐含了以上四个选项。

trans-unit.source: bl3-save-info will now also report on whether the savegame has finished the main game or any of the DLCs.
trans-unit.target: bl3-save-info 现在还将报告保存游戏是否已完成主游戏或任何DLC。

trans-unit.source: v1.8.2 - July 27, 2020
trans-unit.target: v1.8.2- 2020年7月27日

trans-unit.source: Add in the --csv option to allow importing/exporting items into CSV files, instead of just text files (which is the default without --csv). Has no effect except on item imports/exports.
trans-unit.target: 添加 --csv 选项以允许将项目导入/导出到CSV文件中，而不仅仅是文本文件（默认情况下不使用 --csv ）。除了对物品进出口没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Added --all-challenges argument, to list all challenges in the save file and their statuses (note: this will be over 1.5k items!)
trans-unit.target: 添加了 --all-challenges 参数，以列出保存文件中的所有挑战及其状态（注意：这将超过1.5k！）

trans-unit.source: Added --all-missions argument, to list all completed missions in addition to active ones
trans-unit.target: 添加了 --all-missions 参数，以列出除活动任务外的所有已完成任务

trans-unit.source: Added --clear-takedowns to get rid of the Takedown mission-pickup notifications for chars you never intend to do Takedowns with.
trans-unit.target: 添加了 --clear-takedowns 来摆脱您不打算使用Takedowns的字符的Takedown任务提取通知。

trans-unit.source: Added --fast-travel argument, to show unlocked fast travel stations
trans-unit.target: 添加了 --fast-travel 参数，以显示未锁定的快速旅行站

trans-unit.source: Added --golden-keys option to bl3-profile-edit, to set available Golden Keys
trans-unit.target: 在 --golden-keys bl3-profile-edit 添加了--golden-keys选项，以设置可用的Golden Keys

trans-unit.source: Added --mayhem-seed option to bl3-save-edit, to set the random seed used to determine active Mayhem modifiers. The seed is now shown in the bl3-save-info output, as well.
trans-unit.target: 在 --mayhem-seed bl3-save-edit 添加了--mayhem-seed选项，以设置用于确定活动Mayhem修改器的随机种子。现在，种子也显示在 bl3-save-info 输出中。

trans-unit.source: Added --randomize-guid option to bl3-save-edit
trans-unit.target: 在 --randomize-guid bl3-save-edit 添加了--randomize-guid选项

trans-unit.source: Added --unfinish-nvhm option to bl3-save-edit, to completely clear out any TVHM data and pretend that NVHM was never finished.
trans-unit.target: 在 --unfinish-nvhm bl3-save-edit 添加了--unfinish-nvhm选项，以完全清除所有TVHM数据并假装NVHM从未完成。

trans-unit.source: Added --unlock cubepuzzle to reset the Eridian Cube puzzle in Desolation's Edge
trans-unit.target: 添加了 --unlock cubepuzzle 以重置荒凉边缘的Eridian Cube拼图

trans-unit.source: Added -V/--version flag to show version number
trans-unit.target: 添加了 -V / --version 标志以显示版本号

trans-unit.source: Added -i/--items argument, to show inventory information
trans-unit.target: 添加了 -i / --items 参数，以显示库存信息

trans-unit.source: Added bl3-save-import-json utility, to load JSON into a savegame
trans-unit.target: 添加了 bl3-save-import-json 实用程序，以将JSON加载到savegame中

trans-unit.source: Added bl3-save-import-protobuf command, to load a raw protobuf file into an existing savegame.
trans-unit.target: 添加了 bl3-save-import-protobuf 命令，以将原始protobuf文件加载到现有的savegame中。

trans-unit.source: Added json output type, to export the protobuf as encoded into JSON
trans-unit.target: 添加了 json 输出类型，以导出编码为JSON的protobuf

trans-unit.source: Added Jetbeast unlocks (both parts and skins)
trans-unit.target: 增加了喷射兽解锁(包括部件和皮肤)。

trans-unit.source: Added ability to alter Mayhem level for items, both in savegames and profile. --item-mayhem-max will set items to the max Mayhem level (10), or --item-mayhem-levels <num> will set a specific level (0 to remove Mayhem from items entirely).
trans-unit.target: 增加了更改存档游戏和个人资料中物品的混乱程度的功能。 --item-mayhem-max 将项目设置为最大Mayhem级别（ 10 ），或者 --item-mayhem-levels <num> 将设置特定级别（ 0 将从项目中完全删除Mayhem）。

trans-unit.source: Added ability to change item/weapon levels, using --items-to-char or --item-levels
trans-unit.target: 使用 --items-to-char 或 --item-levels 增加了更改物品/武器等级的能力

trans-unit.source: Added in Citizen Science mission name.
trans-unit.target: 在公民科学任务名称中添加。

trans-unit.source: Added in new cosmetic unlocks
trans-unit.target: 加入了新的化妆品解锁

trans-unit.source: Added three more DLC3 room decorations that I'd missed orginally, for the profile editor's cosmetic-unlock ability
trans-unit.target: 增加了三个我原来遗漏的DLC3房间装饰,用于资料编辑器的化妆品解锁功能。

trans-unit.source: Added various Guardian Rank processing
trans-unit.target: 增加各种守护者等级处理

trans-unit.source: All code in this project is licensed under the zlib/libpng license. A copy is provided in COPYING.txt.
trans-unit.target: 该项目中的所有代码均根据 zlib / libpng许可获得许可。COPYING.txt中提供了一个副本。

trans-unit.source: Allow characters to use skill trees properly if levelled higher directly from level 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果从1级直接提升等级,允许角色正确使用技能树。

trans-unit.source: Allow setting character/item levels higher than the currently-known max, in case users want to pre-level their saves ahead of level cap increases (and in case they don't want to wait for an official update of this app)
trans-unit.target: 允许设置角色/物品等级高于当前已知的最大等级,以防用户想在等级上限增加前预设自己的保存等级(以防他们不想等待该应用的官方更新)。

trans-unit.source: Alphabetizing the list of room decorations, trinkets, and weapon skins
trans-unit.target: 按字母顺序排列的房间装饰品、小饰品和武器皮肤列表。

trans-unit.source: Altering the level of gear stored in the bank
trans-unit.target: 改变存储在库中的装备水平。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you want to download or run the Github version of the app: clone the repository and then install protobuf (you can use pip3 install -r requirements.txt to do so, though a pip3 install protobuf will also work just fine).
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您要下载或运行该应用程序的Github版本：克隆存储库，然后安装 protobuf （您可以使用 pip3 install -r requirements.txt 来执行此操作，尽管 pip3 install protobuf 也可以正常工作）。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you've got a savegame exported as JSON that you'd like to import into an existing savegame, you can do that with bl3-save-import-json:
trans-unit.target: 另外，如果您有一个要导出为JSON的保存游戏要导入到现有的保存游戏中，则可以使用 bl3-save-import-json 进行操作：

trans-unit.source: Bah, forgot a few more README tweaks about the JSON export/import
trans-unit.target: 呸,忘记了一些关于JSON导出/导入的README调整。

trans-unit.source: Basically what I'm saying is that anything remotely "hard" in here is all thanks to lots of other folks. I'm just pasting together all their stuff. Thanks, all!
trans-unit.target: 基本上我想说的是,这里的任何远程 "硬 "的东西都要感谢很多其他的人。我只是把他们的东西都粘贴在一起。谢谢大家!

trans-unit.source: Borderlands 3 Commandline Savegame/Profile Editor
trans-unit.target: 边境之地3命令行保存游戏/配置文件编辑器

trans-unit.source: Borderlands 3 Savegame Editor
trans-unit.target: 边境之地3保存游戏编辑器

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Counts of unlocked cosmetic items in bl3-profile-info will now include the "default" cosmetics which are always unlocked, so those counts match the numbers in-game.
trans-unit.target: bl3-profile-info 中解锁化妆品的计数现在将包括始终被解锁的“默认”化妆品，因此这些计数与游戏中的数字匹配。

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: 学分

trans-unit.source: Display changes for bl3-save-info - introduced individual arguments to show more detailed information as-requested, instead of only having a global -v/--verbose option:
trans-unit.target: 显示 bl3-save-info 的更改-引入了各个参数以按要求显示更多详细信息，而不是仅使用全局 -v / --verbose 选项：

trans-unit.source: Editor Usage
trans-unit.target: 编辑器用途

trans-unit.source: Extra SDU levels added
trans-unit.target: 增加的额外SDU级别

trans-unit.source: FOr instructions on using the Profile portions of the editor, see README-profile.md.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用编辑器的“个人档案”部分的说明，请参阅 README-profile.md。

trans-unit.source: Finally, there's a utility which I'd used to generate my BL3 Savegame Archive Page. This one won't be useful to anyone but me, but you can view its arguments as well, if you like:
trans-unit.target: 最后，有一个实用程序，我用来生成 BL3 Savegame存档页面。除我之外，该选项对任何人都无用，但您也可以查看其参数，如果您愿意：

trans-unit.source: Finding Savegames
trans-unit.target: 寻找拯救游戏

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug related to viewing vehicle unlocks, thanks to new game data
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个与查看车辆解锁有关的错误,感谢新的游戏数据。

trans-unit.source: Fixed alphabetization of COV Buzzaxe room decoration. In the game data it looks like it's called "Psycho Buzzaxe," but the actual in-game label is COV Buzzaxe.
trans-unit.target: 修正了COV Buzzaxe房间装饰的字母化。在游戏数据中,看起来像是叫 "Psycho Buzzaxe",但实际游戏中的标签是COV Buzzaxe。

trans-unit.source: Fixed name displays for "regular" (non-E-Tech, non-Legendary) Maliwan snipers and Tediore pistols.
trans-unit.target: 修正了 "常规"(非E-Tech,非Legendary)马里万狙击手和泰迪奥雷手枪的名称显示。

trans-unit.source: For instructions on using the Savegame portions of the editor, see README-saves.md.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用编辑器的Savegame部分的说明，请参阅 README-saves.md。

trans-unit.source: For only profiles, added --min-guardian-rank, --guardian-rank-rewards, and --guardian-rank-tokens
trans-unit.target: 对于仅配置文件，添加了 --min-guardian-rank ，-- --guardian-rank-rewards --guardian-rank-tokens 和 --guardian-rank-tokens

trans-unit.source: For savegames and profiles, added --zero-guardian-rank
trans-unit.target: 对于保存游戏和配置文件，添加了 --zero-guardian-rank

trans-unit.source: If that works, you can then run the pip3 install bl3-cli-saveedit command as mentioned above, and use the commandline scripts to edit to your heart's content.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pip3 install bl3-cli-saveedit ，则可以如上所述运行pip3 install bl3-cli-saveedit命令，并使用命令行脚本来编辑您的心脏内容。

trans-unit.source: If we fail to read a savefile or profile, might be nice to actually check if it's the other of profile-or-savefile, and give a more helpful message in those cases.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们不能阅读SAVEFILE或个人资料，可能是不错的实际检查，如果是其他的个人资料，或-SAVEFILE的，在这些情况下给予更多的帮助信息。

trans-unit.source: If you're on Windows 10, you can apparently just type python3 into a command prompt to be taken to the Windows store, where you can install Python with just one click. I've heard reports that this method does not provide the ability to add Python to your system PATH, though, so it's possible that running it would be more complicated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Windows 10，则显然可以在命令提示符下键入 python3 进入Windows应用商店，只需单击一下即可在其中安装Python。我听说过报道，这种方法并不能提供对Python添加到系统路径，虽然能力，所以它可能是运行会比较复杂。

trans-unit.source: If you've got a raw savegame protobuf file that you've hand-edited (or otherwise processed) that you'd like to import into an existing savegame, you can do that with bl3-save-import-protobuf:
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一个原始的savegame protobuf文件，您已经手工编辑（或以其他方式处理）想要导入到现有的savegame中，则可以使用 bl3-save-import-protobuf 做到这一点：

trans-unit.source: Importing/Exporting items to/from the bank
trans-unit.target: 向银行输入/输出项目。

trans-unit.source: Importing/Exporting to both JSON and Protobuf
trans-unit.target: 导入/导出为JSON和Protobuf。

trans-unit.source: In item export files
trans-unit.target: 在项目导出文件中

trans-unit.source: In verbose bl3-save-info output
trans-unit.target: 在详细的 bl3-save-info 输出中

trans-unit.source: Info views will show the total number of available SDUs along with the purchased count
trans-unit.target: 信息视图将显示可用的 SDU 总数和已购买的数量。

trans-unit.source: Initial version
trans-unit.target: 初始版本

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Introduction of profile editing utilities, via bl3-profile-edit, bl3-profile-info, bl3-profile-import-json, and bl3-profile-import-protobuf. The following functionality is supported:
trans-unit.target: 通过 bl3-profile-edit ， bl3-profile-info ， bl3-profile-import-json 和 bl3-profile-import-protobuf 引入配置文件编辑实用程序。支持以下功能：

trans-unit.source: It does not offer any direct ability to alter Guardian Rank status.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供任何直接改变守护者等级状态的能力。

trans-unit.source: Item Imports will now not import Fabricators unless explicitly told to with the --allow-fabricator option.
trans-unit.target: 除非使用 --allow-fabricator 选项明确告知，否则“ 项目导入”现在将不会导入“制造方” 。

trans-unit.source: Item Levels can be changed
trans-unit.target: 可更改项目等级

trans-unit.source: Item export will now be done without any encryption, so an item will have the exact same item code regardless of where it came from (previously, item codes would change every time the game was saved, so the same item could have very different-looking codes)
trans-unit.target: 现在,物品导出将在没有任何加密的情况下进行,所以无论物品来自哪里,都会有完全相同的物品代码(以前,每次保存游戏时,物品代码都会改变,所以同样的物品可能有非常不同的代码)。

trans-unit.source: Item level reports when viewing contents or exporting items will include the Mayhem levels
trans-unit.target: 查看内容或导出项目时,项目级别的报告将包括Mayhem级别。

trans-unit.source: Item name processing will now recognize the specific legendary artifact balances added by the Maliwan Takedown update (they're functionally identical to the world- drop versions)
trans-unit.target: 物品名称处理现在将识别马里湾攻城战更新所添加的特定传奇神器余额(它们与世界掉落版本功能相同

trans-unit.source: Item names and levels are now shown where appropriate:
trans-unit.target: 现在在适当的地方显示项目名称和级别。

trans-unit.source: Jetbeast vehicle unlocks are forthcoming, until I can actually test them out.
trans-unit.target: 喷射兽车辆解锁即将到来,直到我可以实际测试出来。

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Many thanks also to Baysix, who endured an awful lot of basic questions about pulling apart item serial numbers. Without their help, we wouldn't have item level editing (or nice item names in the output)!
trans-unit.target: 还要感谢Baysix,他忍受了很多关于拆分物品序列号的基本问题。如果没有他们的帮助,我们就不会有物品级别的编辑(或者在输出中出现漂亮的物品名称)。

trans-unit.source: Mayhem Level can be set on items
trans-unit.target: 可对物品进行伤害等级设置

trans-unit.source: Mayhem level can now be set as high as 10
trans-unit.target: 混乱等级现在可以设置到10级。

trans-unit.source: Notes for People Using Windows
trans-unit.target: 使用Windows的人的注意事项

trans-unit.source: Once installed, there should be a few new commandline utilities available to you. The main editor is bl3-save-edit, and you can see its possible arguments with -h/--help:
trans-unit.target: 安装后，应该有几个新的命令行实用程序可供您使用。主编辑器是 bl3-save-edit ，您可以使用 -h / --help 查看其可能的参数：

trans-unit.source: Other Utilities
trans-unit.target: 其他公用事业

trans-unit.source: Please keep the following in mind:
trans-unit.target: 请牢记以下几点:

trans-unit.source: Running from Github
trans-unit.target: 从Github运行

trans-unit.source: Some saves include Eridium as an ammo type, presumably related to the Fabricator. Fixed a crash in bl3-save-info related to that.
trans-unit.target: 一些节省包括Eridium作为弹药类型，大概与制造者有关。修复了与此相关的 bl3-save-info 中的崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Something a bit more Enum-like for various things in __init__.py; I know that's not very Pythonic, but when dealing with extra-Python data formats, one must sometimes make exceptions.
trans-unit.target: __init__.py 中的各种东西有点像枚举；我知道这不是Python语言，但是在处理额外的Python数据格式时，有时必须设置例外。

trans-unit.source: TODO
trans-unit.target: 待办事项

trans-unit.source: Table of Contents
trans-unit.target: 目录

trans-unit.source: The app has only very limited item-editing capability at the moment, which is restricted to:
trans-unit.target: 该应用目前只有非常有限的项编辑功能,仅限于。

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to install this app is via pip/pip3. Once Python 3 is installed, you should be able to run this to install the app:
trans-unit.target: 安装此应用程序最简单的方法是通过 pip / pip3 。安装Python 3后，您应该可以运行以下代码来安装应用程序：

trans-unit.source: The encryption/decryption stanzas in BL3Save.__init__ and BL3Save.save_to were helpfully provided by Gibbed (rick 'at' gibbed 'dot' us), so many thanks for that! The protobuf definitions are also provided by Gibbed, from his Borderlands3Protos repo, and used with permission. Gibbed also kindly provided the exact hashing mechanism used to work with weapon skins and trinkets.
trans-unit.target: BL3Save.__init__ （ BL3Save.save_to 地提供了BL3Save .__ init__和BL3Save.save_to 中的加密/解密节 ，非常感谢！Gibbed也从他的Borderlands3Protos存储库中提供了protobuf定义 ，并经许可使用。Gibbed还友好地提供了用于武器皮肤和饰品的精确哈希机制。

trans-unit.source: The equivalents for each of the commands are listed in their individual README files, linked below.
trans-unit.target: 每条命令的等价物都列在各自的 README 文件中,链接如下。

trans-unit.source: The recommended way is to install Python from python.org. Grab what's available in the 3.x series (at time of writing, that's either 3.8.2 or 3.7.7), and when it's installing, make sure to check the checkbox which says something like "add to PATH", so that you can run Python from the commandline directly.
trans-unit.target: 推荐的方法是从python.org安装Python。抓住3.x系列中的可用内容（在撰写本文时，它是3.8.2或3.7.7），并且在安装时，请确保选中带有“添加到PATH”之类的复选框，以便您可以直接从命令行运行Python。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the savegame format was gleaned from 13xforever/Ilya's gvas-converter project: https://github.com/13xforever/gvas-converter
trans-unit.target: savegame格式的其余部分来自13xforever / Ilya的 gvas-converter 项目：https：//github.com/13xforever/gvas-converter

trans-unit.source: There are also profile-specific versions of most of those commands, which can be used to edit the main BL3 profile.sav:
trans-unit.target: 大多数这些命令还具有特定于配置文件的版本，可用于编辑主要的BL3配置文件 profile.sav ：

trans-unit.source: There's also a bl3-save-info utility which just shows some information about a specified savefile. You can see its possible arguments with -h/--help as well:
trans-unit.target: 还有一个 bl3-save-info 实用程序，它仅显示有关指定保存文件的一些信息。您还可以通过 -h / --help 查看其可能的参数 ：

trans-unit.source: This app does not have any graphical interface. You must be on a commandline in order to use it.
trans-unit.target: 这个应用程序没有任何图形界面。你必须在命令行上才能使用它。

trans-unit.source: This app doesn't actually know where your savegames or profiles are located. When you give it a filename, it'll expect that the file lives in your "current" directory, unless the filename includes all its path information. When launching a cmd.exe on Windows, for instance, you'll probably start out in your home directory (C:\Users\username), but your savegames will actually live in a directory more like C:\Users\username\My Documents\My Games\Borderlands 3\Saved\SaveGames\<numbers>\. The easiest way to run the utilities is to just use cd to go into the dir where your saves are (or otherwise launch your commandline in the directory you want). Otherwise, you could copy the save into your main user dir (and then copy back after editing), or even specify the full paths with the filenames.
trans-unit.target: 这个程序实际上并不知道哪里你的游戏存档或配置文件所在的位置。当给它一个文件名时，除非文件名包含其所有路径信息，否则它将期望文件位于“当前”目录中。例如，在Windows上启动 cmd.exe 时，您可能会从主目录（ C:\Users\username ）开始，但是您的savegames实际上将驻留在更类似于 C:\Users\username\My Documents\My Games\Borderlands 3\Saved\SaveGames\<numbers>\ 。运行实用程序的最简单方法是仅使用 cd 进入保存文件的目录（或者以其他方式在所需目录中启动命令行）。否则，您可以将保存内容复制到主用户目录中（然后在编辑后再复制回去），甚至可以使用文件名指定完整路径。

trans-unit.source: This editor has only been tested on PC Savegames -- other platforms' savegames are not supported at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 本编辑器只在PC保存游戏上进行了测试--目前不支持其他平台的保存游戏。

trans-unit.source: This editor requires Python 3, and has been tested on 3.7 and 3.8. It also requires the protobuf package.
trans-unit.target: 该编辑器需要Python 3，并且已经在3.7和3.8上进行了测试。它还需要protobuf软件包。

trans-unit.source: This is a command-line utility, which means there's no graphical interface, and you'll have to run it from either a Windows cmd.exe prompt, or presumably running through PowerShell should work, too. The first step is to install Python:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个命令行实用程序，这意味着没有图形界面，您必须从Windows cmd.exe 提示符下运行它，或者大概也可以通过PowerShell 运行它。第一步是安装Python：

trans-unit.source: This project is a commandline Python-based Borderlands 3 Savegame and Profile Editor. It's a companion to the very similar CLI editor for BL2/TPS, and provides some very similar functionality. It can be used to level up your characters, unlock Mayhem modes early in the game, unlock TVHM, add SDUs, unlock equipment slots, and more.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是基于Python的命令行工具Borderlands 3 Savegame和Profile Editor。它是非常相似的BL2 / TPS CLI编辑器的伴侣 ，并提供了一些非常相似的功能。它可用于升级角色，在游戏初期解锁Mayhem模式，解锁TVHM，添加SDU，解锁设备插槽等等。

trans-unit.source: Unit tests?
trans-unit.target: 单元测试?

trans-unit.source: Unlocking all global customizations/cosmetics
trans-unit.target: 解锁所有全球定制/化妆品

trans-unit.source: Update item/weapon handling to understand new serial number versions
trans-unit.target: 更新物品/武器处理方式,以了解新的序列号版本。

trans-unit.source: Updated bl3-process-archive-saves to clear out some 3rd-playthrough data which earlier versions had accidentally introduced (only really of interest to myself)
trans-unit.target: 更新了 bl3-process-archive-saves 以清除早期版本意外引入的一些第三遍播放数据（我自己才真正感兴趣）

trans-unit.source: Updated bl3-process-archive-saves to wipe out Guardian Rank entirely
trans-unit.target: 更新了 bl3-process-archive-saves 以完全清除Guardian Rank

trans-unit.source: Updated Credits section of the README with one more credit that I'd wanted to put in but forgot. :)
trans-unit.target: 更新了 README 中的 Credits 部分,多了一个我想放进去却忘了放的 Credits。)

trans-unit.source: Updated README with some more specific Windows 10 installation advice.
trans-unit.target: 更新了 README,提供了一些更具体的 Windows 10 安装建议。

trans-unit.source: Updated for DLC3 (Bounty of Blood) content
trans-unit.target: 更新了DLC3(血之赏金)内容。

trans-unit.source: Updated for extra content introduced by Takedown at the Guardian Breach
trans-unit.target: 更新了Takedown在守护者突围赛上介绍的额外内容。

trans-unit.source: Updated for the Cartels + Mayhem 2.0 patch:
trans-unit.target: 更新了卡特尔+混乱2.0补丁。

trans-unit.source: Updated item name mapping to distinguish between the blue-rarity mission reward version of Redistributor from the legendary version from Maliwan Takedown.
trans-unit.target: 更新了物品名称映射,以区分蓝色稀有度任务奖励版的Redistributor和Maliwan Takedown的传奇版。

trans-unit.source: Updated item name mapping to include the COM Balances used by Trials bosses, for their dedicated COM drops.
trans-unit.target: 更新了物品名称映射,以包括试炼boss使用的COM平衡,为他们的专用COM掉落。

trans-unit.source: Updated room decoration/trinket/weaponskin alphabetization to ignore case (so "Casino Banner" sorts before "COV Bat," for instance).
trans-unit.target: 更新了房间装饰/饰品/武器皮肤的字母排序,使其忽略大小写(所以 "Casino Banner "排序在 "COV Bat "之前)。

trans-unit.source: Updated to Protobuf v3, which is what BL3 itself uses. Now when we re-save without any edits, the save should be identical to the original savegame.
trans-unit.target: 更新到Protobuf v3,这是BL3自己使用的。现在当我们重新保存时,没有任何编辑,保存的内容应该和原来的保存游戏一样。

trans-unit.source: Updated to allow unlocking the Battle Driver and Devil Tooth weapon trinkets, since the July 23 patch fixed those so that they properly stay in your profile.
trans-unit.target: 更新后允许解锁战斗驱动和恶魔之牙武器饰品,因为7月23日的补丁修复了这些饰品,使它们正确地留在你的个人资料中。

trans-unit.source: Upgrading
trans-unit.target: 升级

trans-unit.source: Various BL3 Savegame/Profile editors have been popping up, ever since Gibbed released the encryption details. Here's a few which could be more to your liking, if you didn't want to use this one for whatever reason:
trans-unit.target: 自从Gibbed公布了加密细节后,各种BL3 Savegame/Profile编辑器就层出不穷。这里有几个可能更符合你的胃口,如果你因为某种原因不想用这个的话。

trans-unit.source: Various internal code reorganization
trans-unit.target: 各种内部代码重组

trans-unit.source: When a new version is available, you can update using pip3 like so:
trans-unit.target: 当有新版本可用时，您可以使用 pip3 进行更新，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When it's installed, test that you can run it from the commandline. Open up either cmd.exe or PowerShell, and make sure that you see something like this when you run python -V:
trans-unit.target: 安装后，测试是否可以从命令行运行它。打开 cmd.exe 或PowerShell，并确保在运行 python -V 时看到类似以下内容：

trans-unit.source: While I have not experienced any data loss with the app, take backups of your savegames before using this, and keep in mind that it could end up corrupting your saves. If you do encounter any data loss problems, please contact me and I'll try to at least fix whatever bug caused it.
trans-unit.target: 尽管我在使用该应用程序时没有遇到任何数据丢失的情况，但 请在使用this之前备份您的savegames，并请记住，这可能会破坏您的保存内容。如果您确实遇到任何数据丢失问题，请与我联系，我将尽力至少修复造成此问题的任何错误。

trans-unit.target: 在导入项目时
